attacks.name: Pain Amplifier
attacks.effect: Put a damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon that already has any damage counters on it.

attacks.name: Call of the Night
attacks.effect: Unless this attack Knocks Out the Defending Pokémon, flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, your opponent shuffles his or her Active Pokémon and all cards attached to it into his or her deck.
